Title: Multi-target prediction based on ChEMBL data
Description: This is a ligand-based target prediction model developed by the ChEMBL team. They trained the model using pairs of small molecules and their protein targets, and produced a predictor for two cut-offs: 1uM and 10uM. The model predicts the main target of a small molecule with an accuracy of 69%. These predictors are available since ChEMBL\_18 and have been subsequently updated since. You can read more about it in the ChEMBL blogpost. Here we use the ChEMBL\_25 version (2019).
Interpretation: Main protein target. Thresholds at 10 uM and 1 uM
